rows.label: tlk43400443_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Since the refugees from Acedia arrived
life's been pretty tough...

rows.label: tlk43400443_04_msg0002
rows.name:
But things have gotten a bit better
thanks to you and your friends.

rows.label: tlk43400443_04_msg0003
rows.name:
It should have been the nobles' job
to sort it all out... But you picked
up the slack when they failed us.

rows.label: tlk43400443_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Thank you for your help. Me, my
children...we're all ever so grateful.
